channel.title: Replaying HL1 on Steam, want mod suggetions plz
channel.description:
I'm looking for mods that affect how Gordon goes about crowbaring his way to Nihilanth.
Texture mods, gun balance mods, difficulty balance, that sort of thing.
Thank you for your time.
here's a pic of a dwarf slapping a brat [img]https://cache.gawker.com/assets/images/comment/8/2011/04/40eae7301549751c6ea7e11666eee497/340x.gif[/img]

item.title: Replaying HL1 on Steam, want mod suggetions plz
item.dc:creator: x689thanatos
item.description:
Hello

It’s a little late but ;

You can get the hd texture pack for HL1 from steam (easy way).
https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=3157-QDVN-1426
this link from steam provide install link and uninstall link for the texture pack.

More info here
https://half-life.wikia.com/wiki/Half-Life_High_Definition_Pack

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Wimpoman
item.description:
Oh herrow! I’m looking for a weapons only mod for HL1, something similar to SMOD with some pointless-and-silly weapons I can have fun with. Any suggestions please? Thanks in advance.

item.title: Replaying HL1 on Steam, want mod suggetions plz
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Um. No. No, definitely not. Although when BM’s assets become available in the SDK, I’m sure a fair few will be remade. I myself am considering remaking Affliction, which is one of my favorite HL mods.

item.title: Replaying HL1 on Steam, want mod suggetions plz
item.dc:creator: punisher1565
item.description:
bobbo:

I dont know if it’s possible to enhance the HL1 experience.

BUT

Once you re-beat the game with what mods you find…

play this…

https://www.moddb.com/mods/scientist-slaughterhouse

ahhh Scientists Slaughterhouse… short but sweet… I can only imagine this on the source engine!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: MechUnit
item.description:
mental2k:

Real men build computers out of shit lying round the house. Then cry when the graphics card is shit. True.

On electric chairs: https://hackaday.com/2011/07/10/a-homemade-electric-chair-reveals-a-darker-side-of-hacking/

lol

xalener:

HL is MEANT to be played on the settings it CAME WITH for MAXIMUM NOSTALGIA.

How you didn’t understand what I said at first is fucking ridiculous.

ummm, ok, if you say so… (lol’d)

Read full topic

Wait, so if you lose under 10 units nothing happens?

Alright, you hardass cool kid. i’ll step it up to 1000 volts for every 10 units of health lost.

<3

item.title: Replaying HL1 on Steam, want mod suggetions plz
item.dc:creator: MechUnit
item.description:
ac3d:

He’s closing his eyes before the slap even hits, most people wouldn’t even blink if they didn’t know a slap was coming, but if he has time to blink beforehand, then he should have enough time to duck as well

and this has what to do with the thread?

xalener:

When I play HL1, I play on all the lowest possible settings.

Like a real man.

on your girlfriend’s or little sisters computer? a real man has a real machine that can handle all games in full detail

Read full topic
item.source: Replaying HL1 on Steam, want mod suggetions plz

item.title: Replaying HL1 on Steam, want mod suggetions plz
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Ryλn:

I connected my PC up to a fully-functional electric chair and programmed HL to give me a 200 volt shock everytime I lose 10 units of health.

(iron ankle, wrist, and head constraints included once the game starts. They unlock once you beat the game and there is no exiting.)

And when my health reaches 0 or I die, I get a 400 volt shock and enter a stunned unconscious state for about 2 to 4 hours only to wake up again and try all over again til i beat it.

Like a real man.

Wait, so if you lose under 10 units nothing happens?

ac3d:

He’s closing his eyes before the slap even hits, most people wouldn’t even blink if they didn’t know a slap was coming, but if he has time to blink beforehand, then he should have enough time to duck as well

Of all the things to do when a dwarf swings at you, DUCK?

wat

Read full topic

item.title: Replaying HL1 on Steam, want mod suggetions plz
item.dc:creator: Ry_amp_955_n
item.description:
I connected my PC up to a fully-functional electric chair and programmed HL to give me a 200 volt shock everytime I lose 10 units of health.

(iron ankle, wrist, and head constraints included once the game starts. They unlock once you beat the game and there is no exiting.)

And when my health reaches 0 or I die, I get a 400 volt shock and enter a stunned unconscious state for about 2 to 4 hours only to wake up again and try all over again til i beat it.

Like a real man.

item.description:
ac3d:

He’s closing his eyes before the slap even hits, most people wouldn’t even blink if they didn’t know a slap was coming, but if he has time to blink beforehand, then he should have enough time to duck as well

Blinking is probably an unconditioned reflex.

item.title: Replaying HL1 on Steam, want mod suggetions plz
item.dc:creator: Ry_amp_955_n
item.description:
SolidSnake9001:

https://www.svencoop.com - play it with your friends
https://www.gamebanana.com/skins/games/34
https://www.gamebanana.com/skins/games/54
Both skins will work, but using the 9mmAR skins for HL in Sven may have some undesired effects.

Your links do not work for me. Try editing them and fixing them.

but yeah, Just play Half-Life: Source and install a bunch of re-texture packs and hi-res models and weapons from gamebanana.com
